page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content: ROBERTS ENGINEERING The current owner is Mr.Wellbourne. The name Roberts comes from his mother a previous proprietor.The firm started as a Wheelwrights. It is situated on the B651. Today the firm does a variety of engineering activities and some of its work goes all over the world. Engines are rebuilt.The firm also builds machinery for preparing prepacked chickens for the table.Mr. Wellbourne made this machinery himself and it is now used in many countries. Other engineering and servicing activities help make Roberts Engineering an important employer in the village.
